review: *** ** ** ********* ******* Very soft spoken n motivating.. My wife had a small issue n she panicked.. We were about to cancel one of our planned trip. She motivated her n gave her confidence.. Assisted us in all possible ways. Thank you so much for your help

Dr Gilada consulted us via video call as we as a family were covid positive. 
She spoke to every member who was majorly affected by covid and gave a positive encouraging response. 
Patient and caring with a million dollar smile, she prescribed medication and all our problems vanished.

Doctor turned up late for an online consultation. While that can happen, * *** ******* ** *** *** ****** ******** **** *** ************ *** ****. My mom was suffering from high blood pressure since a few days & it was critical that she got the medication on time. This doctor didn't even bother to prescribe her medicines until I contacted the Support Team. I have lost trust in doctors ******* ** ****** **** *** *** ** ****** * * ********* * *** ** ****** ******* ** ****
